thread.title: EastEnders, Corrie, Emmerdale, Hollyoaks: Friday's soap highlights
thread.title_full: EastEnders, Corrie, Emmerdale, Hollyoaks: Friday's soap highlights

title: EastEnders, Corrie, Emmerdale, Hollyoaks: Friday's soap highlights
text:
EastEnders, Corrie, Emmerdale, Hollyoaks : we take a look at tonight's top soap stories… EastEnders, BBC1, 8pm Stacey confronts Shabnam at the park when she sees her friend with Jade. Shabs insists she's not trying to replace Zaair, but wants to protect Jade and take care of her. 
© BBC Breaking down, Shabnam opens up about the death of her son, and after sharing a hug with Jade, agrees to take her home. But will Shabnam pursue the residency order? Coronation Street, ITV, 7.30pm & 8.30pm Maria is stunned when Norris let's slip he saw Luke heading off with Jamie and a track car. 
© ITV Waiting for her boyfriend to return, Maria strides over when he does and confronts him. She tells him she knows he lied to her and that he's been racing. She gives him an ultimatum: her or the racing. What will he decide? Emmerdale, ITV, 7pm The Dingles rally round Chas following Aaron's arrest, but she finds it hard when she visits him in prison. Aaron tells her what happened the night of the shooting, but is he telling the truth? And will she believe him? 
© ITV Back home, Chas breaks down after Diane says she'll never forgive her. Then, in the early hours of the morning, Chas wakes up and heads downstairs to find broken glass from smashed bottles everywhere. Is someone targeting Chas? Hollyoaks, C4, 6.30pm Ben finds Sienna and Nico before Ashley does and puts them in an interview room at the station for safety, but Ashley is watching from the shadows and knows exactly where they have gone. 
© Lime Pictures When the fire alarm at the station goes off, Sienna and Nico are led out by a police woman – but it's actually Ashley dressed up as a one. She locks them in a car, and pours petrol all around it, threatening them. but will they escape it?
